content:
This chunk defines a set of keyboard shortcut bindings and their corresponding action descriptions within the context of an interactive 3D modeling or game development application framework, likely used to configure command shortcuts for common operations like making objects live, creating new scenes, saving, opening scenes, and quitting.

'control-l': ('Make Live', 'LE-MakeLive'),
            'control-n': ('New Scene', 'LE-NewScene'),
            'control-s': ('Save Scene', 'LE-SaveScene'),
            'control-o': ('Open Scene', 'LE-OpenScene'),
            'control-q': ('Quit', 'LE-Quit'),
        }
